replies.msg:
舊玩法係
COLA + 跳PT

新玩法係
半個COLA (COLA* 0.5) + performance base ($X = (COLA* 0.5) + $Y)

$Y 係冇人知每年幾多
淨係話每年都一個budget 比department (performance increment)

但成個 $X 係按 員工表現俾

如果比人針對, 有機會係$X = 0, 連半個 COLA 都無埋, 好仆街!!!

replies.msg:
其實係度扭數
E.g. 政府批左一個人頭比你，你將個筆直打散用，拆做兩個低薪合約。但是終會有一日收唔到科，因為一個人頭既數未必cover 到兩個合約加幅。
或者掉轉咁計
佢每人cut 半個point 既升幅就可以請多幾個低薪合約。或者一個半個低能賤格，出賣低層，玩政治既中層高管。

給港大教職員及學生的重要公告：

大學管理小組考慮到颱風過後可能出現的交通混亂、校園內要清理倒塌樹木、維修各樣受風災損毀的設施，宣布明天 （ 9 月 17日）停課一天。

至於大學各辦事處則會在八號風球除下後，逐步恢復正常服務，如教職員因為安全、交通等困難未能依時上班，則請與部門主管協商安排。部門主管會酌情處理員工工作安排，包括在家工作或在上班時間作彈性安排。

Important notice for all HKU staff and students:

Despite the agreed arrangements for classes during bad weather as announced on the University web-site, the Senior Management of the University has decided to cancel ALL classes tomorrow (September 17, 2018). The decision is made in view of the likely traffic chaos tomorrow and the need for clearing of fallen trees blocking roads in the campus and for repairing work to some campus facilities damaged by the typhoon.

It is expected that University offices will open as usual when Typhoon Warning Signal 8 is lowered. Colleagues having difficulty to return to campus because of safety reason or traffic or other problems, please inform their departments/units accordingly, so that the department heads could exercise discretion regarding working arrangement such as working from home or more flexible on hours to reporting duty once No. 8 is lowered.
